endpoints.description: Submit a new mortgage application with complete financial and personal information.
Retrieve the details of a submitted mortgage application using a unique identifier.
Update information on an existing mortgage application.
Remove a specific mortgage application by its unique identifier.
Analyze and estimate loan feasibility for a specific application.
Check the current status and progress of a submitted mortgage application.
Formalize and submit the mortgage application for further review.
Fetch the current interest rates for different loan types and durations.
Upload required documents for mortgage processing to a user's profile.
Retrieve a list of documents uploaded for a user's mortgage applications.
